FREQUENTLY ASKED
QUESTIONS.

Where is your tattoo shop located ?

25 Chelsea road, Manchester M28 5yn

How do I make an appointment?

There are multiple ways to get an appointment, you can call us on (+44) 1534 564432, send us an email at Inkd@inkd-studio.com or send a direct message on our site, via Instagram or Facebook

Is there a booking fee?

Yes, a booking fee is taken to secure appointments and is non refundable.

Are there any health conditions that might or will prevent me from getting a tattoo?

Yes, there are a few circumstances and conditions that prevent you from being able to get tattooed,

  • Pregnancy or Breastfeeding
  • Diabetes (please consult with your doctor)
  • Psoriasis (please consult with your doctor)
  • Eczema (please consult with your doctor)
  • Blood Disorders
  • heart condition
  • If you have suffered/suffer from Hepatitis or you are HIV positive (please discuss this with your tattoo artist before booking.)
  • Seizures
  • Certain Medications such as blood thinners(anticoagulants), (please consult with your doctor)

How should I prepare for my appointment?

Please hydrate and eat atleast 2 hours before your appointment.

To prepare for a long session, feel free to bring snacks and drinks

Consider the area you plan to get tattooed and wear clothing that makes it easy for the artist to access.

The week / weeks leading up to your appointment using body lotion to keep your skin hydrayed may help the ink apply better during your tattoo appointment

How is the price determined?

25 Chelsea road, Manchester M28 5yn

What are the shops opening hours?

Monday - Fridays 10:00 - 18:00, Saturday 11:00 - 16:00 and Sundays we are closed.

If I am under 18 can I get a tattoo with a parent present?

No, even with parental consent tattooing anyone under 18 is illegal.
